channel.title: Comments on: Don’t trow dinamite at the back of your boat…
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: ecr3designs
item.dc:creator: ecr3designs
item.description: You are supposed to put it on the bow and use it as a boat bomb. Enough speed you can fly onto shore and nail a tank or camping squad.
item.content:encoded: You are supposed to put it on the bow and use it as a boat bomb. Enough speed you can fly onto shore and nail a tank or camping squad.
